title: 5/18/17 - What President Trump should be doing right now! (Sen. Ben Sasse)
description:
Roger Aisles passes away and Glenn discusses the good and bad memories ...Behind the scenes of Glenn's rocky time at Fox News Channel ...Is President Pence a real possibility? ...Things President Trump should be doing right now! ...What the media isn't telling you about Syria ...US Ben Sasse discusses the storms of Washington DC and what President Trump needs to do ...A Republican senator calls out his own.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
